item.description:
Repositioning Real Estate

Local Investor, Peter McLouglin of Boston Property Development will discuss the local real estate market and opportunities.

 

 

 

What You Will Learn

  • What your "value-added" propositions are, and what they are worth in the overall context of a real estate development opportunity.
  • Deal structuring based a person's "value-add"
  • Capitalize Rate and Return on Investment
  • Residential repositioning - what is it, how to do it and real life examples
Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, March 17, 2010

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers

free parking

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
